    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GenericEnablingBootstrapFormComponent<TYPE,FIELD> addBoundComponent(org.apache.wicket.Component c)
      Add component that is bound to the value of this current component, changing the selected element of this component may influence if the bound component is visible or not.
      GenericEnablingBootstrapFormComponent<TYPE,FIELD> addReverseBoundComponent(org.apache.wicket.Component c)
      This is the negated version of addBoundComponent(Component)
      protected abstract boolean boundComponentsVisibilityAllowed(TYPE selectedValue)
      Returns true if the bound components should have Component.setVisibilityAllowed(boolean) to true otherwise returns false.
      protected void onInitialize()
      Re-apply the visibility states of all bound components, this is good because onInitialize() is invoked after the models are initialized, so we know the value of the saved entity selection
      protected void onUpdate(org.apache.wicket.ajax.AjaxRequestTarget target)
      Each time the component gets updated we also refresh the bound components' visibility
      protected void updateBoundComponents(org.apache.wicket.ajax.AjaxRequestTarget target)
      change visibility status of bound components based of the fact the level has an affirmative answer or not
      protected void updateReverseBoundComponents(org.apache.wicket.ajax.AjaxRequestTarget target)
      Reversed of updateBoundComponents(AjaxRequestTarget)

      • boundComponentsVisibilityAllowed

        protected abstract boolean boundComponentsVisibilityAllowed(TYPE selectedValue)
        Returns true if the bound components should have Component.setVisibilityAllowed(boolean) to true otherwise returns false.
        Parameters:
        selectedValue - the selected value of the current component, that may be taken into consideration when evaluating the visibility of the bound components
        Returns:

        public GenericEnablingBootstrapFormComponent<TYPE,FIELD> addBoundComponent(org.apache.wicket.Component c)
        Add component that is bound to the value of this current component, changing the selected element of this component may influence if the bound component is visible or not. By default all bound components are not visible
